Zusammenarbeit mit Food INT - International Transfer & Services
goals__remit:
BUREAU BUNGENBERGi s a unique International food agency to facilitate transnational exchange between producers, commerce, organizations, politics and sciences.  
 
Bureau Bungenberg brings your company and products to new target markets and we create your success on this markets.  
 
Bureau Bungenberg facilitates the international transfer, offers the needed services and creates new markets. Food INT is specialized on food, beverage and agricultural products. 
 
Bureau Bungenberg will find your entry and success in retail, discount, out-of-home sector, convenience, kiosk and small shops, ecological- or ethno shops/ market. We support companies to internationalize their business with a sustainable strategical business development. Food INT Germany is working for the German, Austria und Swiss market, at the same time we have offices and partners all over the world. 
   
Bureau Bungenberg encourages the exchange of knowledge between different food sectors, at national and international level, and provides the practical support for a successful market entry - overall and connecting the line of business. We want you to enter the German market guided and based on a solid strategic concept. 
 
Bureau Bungenberg arranges your market entry moderated, coached and managed, always customized to your market situation and specific needs - adoption of your products to the specific requirements of the German markets. We will be your interim, outsourced or representative management for German market for a sustainable access to the German food market without significant long-term investments! 
 
Bureau Bungenberg helps you to enter European market with new products regarding declaration, law, novel food, sales and transeuropean markets. 
 
Use the partners of Bureau Bungenberg- the competence centre for the German food market.  
 
Are you interested in the German ethno-market? Bureau Bungenbergcan created your entry into this market over the recommendation logo „GUTES ERLAUBT“
